channel.title: Andrew Gower?
channel.description: Does Andrew Gower, the creator of RuneScape, still actively manage the game? Because I just read that 'he left'.

^ this.

item.title: Andrew Gower?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“SunSpec221, post:18, topic:373765”]Thats what i thought…

So why is this abot Andrew… the fag.[/quote]

Because it is discussing where Andrew is at. Why he resigned his post as CEO. And what he is currently contributing to the JaGeX team.

You obviously don’t appreciate RuneScape (as a piece of programming, instead of a game) if you think Andrew is a “fag”.

Read full topic

item.title: Andrew Gower?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:2, topic:373780”]Andrew: Im going on holiday. claps Butt Pirates ready!
Paul: Are we going yet andy baby?
Andrew: Wait Mom…
Mod MMG: I will take over teh JaGeX While you and Pauline go to Hawai
Andrew: MMMMM YUMM Taste laik a som bodee

Andrew has logged out.
Paul has logged out.
Mark has logged in.[/quote]

Hehe win. I’m still laughing as I type this =D

Read full topic

item.title: Andrew Gower?
item.dc:creator: @SunSpec221 SunSpec221
item.description:
@SunSpec221 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:13, topic:373765”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=469762.msg3435679#msg3435679 date=1292744056]

He still helps program RuneScape from time to time, he doesn’t ever play under an undercover name though, he still plays under Andrew and usually it is in secret.
[/quote]I don’t blame him for not playing often. He’d probably cry running around seeing all the bots.

At original post: He did not leave. Someone else was just took over his position as CEO.

So do you think this had an effect on RuneScape’s turnout… Andrew would always have the last word of course, but do you think he’s taken a step back? Or is he the jack-ass still that’s ruining the game?

Andrew “left” the CEO position right before HD came out.[/quote]

Why did he leave?

Read full topic
